body_html:
Yup, the one from August 16 (sorry seems I messed up the link last time).

@bioothod : It's not strictly a runtime change, if you import a graph with these options set and then export it back out to a GraphDef, the exported GraphDef will have the device annotations, right?
body_text:
Yup, the one from August 16 (sorry seems I messed up the link last time).
@bioothod : It's not strictly a runtime change, if you import a graph with these options set and then export it back out to a GraphDef, the exported GraphDef will have the device annotations, right?
body:
Yup, the one from August 16 (sorry seems I messed up [the link](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/20412#issuecomment-413449551) last time).

@bioothod : It's not strictly a runtime change, if you import a graph with these options set and then export it back out to a `GraphDef`, the exported `GraphDef` will have the device annotations, right?
